description.en: Kanade has an exceptionally acute sense of smell which allows him to detect even the faintest aromas in the air around him. Together with his French cousin Anais, he follows those scents all the way to the heart of the deepest and darkest mysteries.
description.pl: Kanade Saikawa jest genialnym perfumiarzem, który zmysł węchu ma tak wyostrzony, że jest w stanie wyczuć każdy najdelikatniejszy nawet zapach rozpoczynając od tytułowego stanu "zero" (braku jakiegokolwiek zapachu). Wraz ze swoją przebojową, pochodzącą z Francji kuzynką, Anais, zostaje on wmieszany w serię tajemniczych wypadków, a to wszystko z powodu jego węchu, który podobno potrafi wychwycić nawet zapach śmierci.

biography.en:
Circle(s): MOON CLOCK

The "Kaori" part of "Kaori Yuki" is her real name. She became a professional manga artist in 1987 after placing in one of the many contests held by Hana to Yume. She supposedly lives as a hermit with her cat, but very little is actually known about her.

As of October 2010, she has a six-year-old daughter and three-year-old son.
